parameters.name: Force
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to forcefully delete the custom image. Valid values:

*   true: forcefully deletes the custom image, regardless of whether the image is being used by instances.
*   false: verifies that the custom image is not being used by instances and then deletes the image.

Default value: false

parameters.name: ImageId
parameters.description: The ID of the image. If the specified custom image does not exist, the request is ignored.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the custom image. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
